result.reason: The connection filter UI lacks a quick way to clear the filter text and visual feedback. Adding a clear button (icon) improves usability.
result.approach: Add a 'Clear' icon (pbClearSearch) to the search panel layout next to the search box, implement its click handler to clear the search text, and adjust visibility based on search text presence.
